DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : TELECOMMUNICATIONS
DOC.TEXT: MCI Closes Sale of 20 % Stake to British Telecom : MCI Communications Corp . said some of the money from the $ 4.3-billion sale may be put into ventures in local telephone_service and wireless communications . MCI Chairman Bert Roberts said the company has a short time in which to make a decision because the federal_government will begin auctioning licenses for the next generation of mobile phone_service on Dec . 5 .
